flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
Felt is one material that can be used in dozens of different ways. Here are 10 uber budget friendly holiday idea:

Felted Lollipop - the shortcut way

Frosted Cupcakes

Peppermint twist felt Gift Tag

Felt Ornament Frame

Personalized felt and foam gift tags

Felt Signage

Festive felt garland
guide.introduction_rendered:
Felt is one material that can be used in dozens of different ways. Here are 10 uber budget friendly holiday idea:

Felted Lollipop - the shortcut way

Frosted Cupcakes

Peppermint twist felt Gift Tag

Felt Ornament Frame

Personalized felt and foam gift tags

Felt Signage

Festive felt garland
guide.summary: Felt is maybe your cheapest crafting option and it is incredibly versatile.  Use it in 10 different ways to make presents, decorate your home, and prepare for a holiday party....all for the crazy budget price of FELT!  Felt is the best.
guide.title: 10 D-I-Y Holiday Decorating hints!
